task.title: How To Install Noter.app
task.shortdesc: This section guides you through the process of installing the Noter.app application on your computer.

ul.li: Supported Operating Systems: Windows 10 (1909) | macOS 10.15 Catalina.
Internet access to download the installer.

context.p: Please follow the procedure outlined below to install the Noter.app application on your computer.

step.info: Open your web browser and go to the Noter.app download page: [Insert Website Link Here].

substep.cmd: Identify the section for your operating system (Windows or macOS).
Your browser will begin downloading a file (e.g., Noter.appSetup.exe for Windows, Noter.app.dmg for macOS).

step.info: Once the download is finished, open your file explorer (Windows) or Finder (macOS) and navigate to your Downloads folder (or the location where your browser saves downloaded files).

substep.cmd: You may see a User Account Control prompt; click "Yes" to allow the installer to run.
Follow the steps in the installation wizard, typically involving agreeing to the license agreement and choosing an installation directory.
A virtual disk image will mount.
Drag the Noter.app icon from the mounted disk image to your Applications folder.
You can then eject the disk image.
Find Noter.app in your Start Menu.
Click to launch. You may also have a desktop shortcut.
The application will open, and you will be prompted to create a new account or log in.

taskbody.result: After successfully completing these steps, the Noter.app application will be installed on your computer and ready to launch.
